details.name: ISO 14289-2:202x - 8.10 Forms - 8.10.3.3 Text fields - RV and V entries
details.description: For text fields, when an RV entry is present a V entry shall also be present, and they shall be textually equivalent

rule.description: For text fields, when an RV entry is present a V entry shall also be present, and they shall be textually equivalent

error.message: Text field contains RV entry, but no V entry or they are not textually equivalent (RV = %1, V = %2)
